clues.text: Spaniards named these furry rodents for the Chincha Indians
Some of the quills of the Eurasian species can be 12 inches, equal to about half of its body length
These rodents of the Plains received their name because they "bark" like canines
Contrary to popular belief, mass drownings by the Norway species of this rodent are not suicidal in nature

rounds.comments: (Alex: Words that sound the same, but mean different things...)

clues.text: A native of Copenhagen, or to stoop to do something
To take a quick look, or the top of a mountain
Antagonistic, or an inexpensive lodging place for young people abroad
It's a sausage, or the absolute least best
A dish, or a braid of hair

The Molasses Act of 1733 placed high duties on molasses & this potent potable from non-English possessions

In 1982 he co-anchored "NBC Nightly News" with Tom Brokaw, & you could say his name is...

I'll have a side of this 13th century English philosopher & creator of the "Opus Majus"
He was to fly as lunar module pilot on the first manned Apollo mission but tragically never made it
The fifth Chief Justice of the United States, he succeeded John Marshall in 1836
Towers built in & along the walls of this fortress include Beklemishev, Peter & Tsar
Erected in the Black Canyon of the Colorado River, its power plant can supply 4 billion kilowatt-hours a year

This city's Church of the Holy Sepulchre was built in the 4th c. by the Emperor Constantine

This Italian word for rich ice cream comes from the Italian for "to freeze"

rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will be a short word, but those letters can be found in the word "America".)

clues.text: To study intensely at the last minute for a test
Edible paddy product
One of these can be pinhole or single-lens reflex
One 500-sheet pack of paper for a copy machine or a printer
For a rectangle, it's width multiplied by length

Hundreds perished April 15, 1997 in a fire during this religious pilgrimage to Mecca

It's the 15 bucks or so an insured patient has to fork over for a visit to a doctor's office

9-letter term for freelance labor that's compensated per unit turned out
Slang for high interest on a loan, it's sometimes shortened to "vig"

rounds.text: 2 of only 3 Republican Presidents who completed 2 full terms in office
rounds.response: (2 of) U.S. Grant, Eisenhower, and Ronald Reagan
